comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: SHOTS FIRED AT KING OF ITALY; Major Langa Hit by Anarchist's Bullet as He Screens Victor Emmanuel. March 15, 1912, Friday ROME, March 14. -- Throughout Italy there is rejoicing to-night over the escape of the King and Queen, at whom a young Anarchist named Antonio Dalba fired several shots this morning as their Majesties were proceeding to the Pantheon to take part in the annual memorial service in memory of the late King Humbert, who was born on March 14, 1844, and who was killed by the Anarchist Bresci at Monza on July 29, 1900. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=990CE1DB143CE633A... Quirinal is in Rome: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quirinal

comment.author: 25250131@N06
comment._content: Great shot! For whoever is interested, there is now a new group related to the History of Anarchy and the Anarchist Movement in Italy since the mid-19th century: www.flickr.com/groups/964254@N23/ You are all welcome to join this group and eventually post your photos related to Anarchy and Italy.

comment.author: 38123137@N00
comment._content: We invite this Quirinale, Italy image to the WILLIAM PHILLIPS [1825-1911] ECO-CENTENARY2011 UK-IRELAND:A1-C1 group. Join us to link history to his Italian visit-sites for the 2011 UK-Irish Festivities! London born Phillips travelled to Italy with companions, and as a Civil Agent was with Mazzini at Caprera. At Milan, he met Cavour’s Agent. He 'dined at the Quirinal'; “supped at the palace of the Fontana Modino with a friend of Mazzini” While he was in Naples, "the great earthquake of Amalfi took place”; and at Messina, a fumare washed "people, houses, cattle, and every living thing, into the sea”. Later, his English Municipal reforms helped to protect trees, and to provide park gazebo bandstands. His humanitarian, campaigns aided Lancashire’s impoverished cotton-workers, and provided Irish Famine Relief . More on Phillips' homes plus descendants -- www.flickr.com/photos/melcir-selfportraits-2006/3577626996/. We hope this eco-living festival will raise real social inspiration. Help us find SPONSORS & VENUES, etc., and volunteers. Please OPEN *ALL SIZES* + copy-tag image William-Phillips-Eco-Centenary-2011. * * Add me as CONTACT / FRIEND * *.
